title: loading screen stuck in 0%
body:
loading screen stuck in 0% then crash because network connection something , my network connection is solo use by me it's great simply , started at 6.22patch help here i cant even play a single game plus i got low periority Q because of that 
(notice : champselect etc works fine i just cant enter after i reconnect it's 0% loading screen then crash ) HELP

replies.body: same problem, I'm stuck in loading screen and have bugsplatted twice in 1 game

This could be either a connection problem or an issue with failing the game to render.  Can you give me the exact specifics or screenshot of your error?  Do this in a custom game to prevent any penalties.  Let me know!

you have disconnected , please check your internet connection and try again ( im sure my internt connection is perfect ) btw , the loading screen was 0% + i cant alt tab to it now , please help me asap im missing the game

Your connection might be perfect, but you can still run into problems connecting to a specific server.  For your specific issue, it does seem like your network is failing to establish that connection so I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
